body:
Hey!

So at some point today, I will be recording a Hide N Seek youtube video. Why this is (was changed the name) aimed toward Gravity Falls fans is because the map that I will be recording on is the entire town of Gravity Falls! It is really cool. So, why I made this post. Well, of course, if you want to play Hide N Seek, you need multiple people. So, if you would like to be in the video and play, tell me below, and also add me on skype.

Skype:
Running_Boy_12

Thanks!
